org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.providedservice

Class ProvidedService.SingletonStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.providedservice.CreationStrategy
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.handlers.providedservice.ProvidedService.SingletonStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.ServiceFactory
    Enclosing class:
    ProvidedService

    private class ProvidedService.SingletonStrategy
extends CreationStrategy
    Singleton creation strategy. This strategy just creates one service object and returns always the same.
